mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, parent_rno) VALUES (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{parentRno, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate, parent_rno as parentRno, del_yn as delYn FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno ASC

SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate, parent_rno as parentRno, del_yn as delYn FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} START WITH parent_rno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR rno = parent_rno ORDER SIBLINGS BY rno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET del_yn = 'Y' WHERE rno = #{rno}
